bibl.title: Maternal Lineage in Greek Magical Texts.

series.title: Papers from the Norwegian Institute at Athens.

bibl.note: Examines the theories concerning the magical use of maternal lineage.

bibl.title: The World of Ancient Magic. Papers from the First International Samson Eitrem Seminar at the Norwegian Institute at Athens, 4-8 May 1997

bibl.seg: CURBERA Jaime B., Maternal Lineage in Greek Magical Texts.

David R. JORDAN, Hugo MONTGOMERY and Einar THOMASSEN (Edd.), The World of Ancient Magic. Papers from the First International Samson Eitrem Seminar at the Norwegian Institute at Athens, 4-8 May 1997 = Papers from the Norwegian Institute at Athens. 4 (Bergen, 1999) pp. 195-204, 1 carte.
Examines the theories concerning the magical use of maternal lineage.
